se.aqba.framework.elpollo

Class ElPollo.Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.aqba.framework.elpollo.ElPollo.Resources
  • Enclosing class:
    ElPollo

    public static class ElPollo.Resources
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for accessing various resource related classes and methods.

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public static void addListener(ElPollo.Resources.Listener listener,
               java.lang.String... pkgs)
        Add a new resource listener that's called when an application's resources are loaded.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener is called when a package's resources are loaded.
        pkgs - Variable list of packages to listen for,
        may be empty to listen for every package (this is strongly discouraged).

      • addReplacement

        public static void addReplacement(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String type,
                  java.lang.Object replacement)
        Add a new system-wide framework resource replacement.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the resource.
        type - The type of the resource.
        replacement - May be a forwarder or an object pertaining to type.
        See Also:
        ElPollo.Resources.Forwarder

      • addReplacement

        public static void addReplacement(java.lang.String pkg,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String type,
                  PResources res,
                  java.lang.Object replacement)
        Add a new resource replacement.
        Parameters:
        pkg - The package that the resource belongs to.
        name - The name of the resource.
        type - The type of the resource.
        replacement - May be a forwarder or an object pertaining to type.
        See Also:
        ElPollo.Resources.Forwarder

      • addReplacement

        public static void addReplacement(int id,
                  java.lang.Object replacement)
        Add a new system-wide framework resource replacement.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the resource you want to replace.
        replacement - May be a forwarder or an object pertaining to the resource type.
        See Also:
        ElPollo.Resources.Forwarder

      • addReplacement

        public static void addReplacement(java.lang.String pkg,
                  int id,
                  java.lang.Object replacement)
        Add a new resource replacement.
        Parameters:
        pkg - The package whose resource you want to replace.
        id - The id of the resource you want to replace.
        replacement - May be a forwarder or an object pertaining to the resource type.
        See Also:
        ElPollo.Resources.Forwarder
